alert.note: Alert for Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:21AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Cass MI County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow showers are expected to re-develop this morning and increase in intensity this afternoon before ending by early evening. The combination of fresh snow and some drifting on roadways will continue to cause hazardous conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
